lyrics.text:
Te u fakahā ‘afe?
Kuo u lavasia;
‘A e tau lelei totonu,
Pea u fa’a ikuna?

He ‘oku ou feinga,
Ke ma kau mo Paula;
‘I he fu’u ikuna na’e
Lava’i ‘e Sīsū.

‘I he faka’osi,
‘A ‘eku fu’u tau ni,
‘Ofa ke u mālohi pehē,
Ki hoku fu’u fili.

Pea te u ongo’i
‘I he’eku mate,
‘Oku ‘i hoku lalo va’e
Hoku fili lahi.

Pea ke ‘a’aku,
‘A e lea pehē,
‘I he’eku hoko atu,
Ki hoku taulanga.

Na’e tauhi’i au
‘E he anga ‘ofa,
Pea u tauhi ‘a e tui,
‘A hoku ‘Otua.

Na’e ‘ikai mafai,
‘E he kau akonga,
‘A hoku ‘Eiki; ha lea
‘Oku lahi hake.

Pea mo e kakai,
‘O e langi foki
‘Oku ‘ikai hanau lea,
‘Oku lahi hake.
